Title: Come Play with Me
Writer: Salvatore Samperi (story), Salvatore Samperi, Sergio Bazzini, Pier Luigi Murgia (collaboration)
Actors: Lisa Gastoni, Lou Castel, Gabriele Ferzetti, Luisa De Santis
Plot: Young Alvise's body is paralyzed, or at least he thinks so. He is infatuated by his beautiful aunt Lea. What starts as innocent therapy and care soon develops into strange erotic and psychological battle between them.
